summary: Consume Mautic API to perform various operations like adding contacts to campaigns, creating companies, modifying contacts, and more.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Select the type of authentication to use (Credentials or OAuth2).

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Choose the type of resource to interact with (e.g., Contact, Company, Campaign Contact).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., Create, Delete, Update).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the company to create (applicable when resource is Company and operation is Create).

parameters.name: simple
parameters.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data (applicable when resource is Company and operation is Create).

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Additional fields for creating a company (e.g., Address details).
